sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> hits your <radical>form</radical> and you begin to <kanji>melt</kanji>. You are a witch and water makes you melt. The tsunami is a lot of water, so once it touches your form, you begin to melt.
meaningInfo: Feel the water from the tsunami crashing into your form. Feel the water on your body as your form begins to melt. I’m melting! I’m mellltiinnnggg!
readingMnemonic: The only way to reverse the <kanji>melt</kanji> process is to eat some <reading>yo</reading>gurt (<ja>よう</ja>). The yogurt counteracts the melting from the water and your form will become whole again. Quick, eat some yogurt!
readingInfo: Feel the melt begin to reverse as you eat your yogurt. Taste the yogurt on your tongue as your form begins to solidify once again.
